title: Short-Intensive Capstone Project Course for Strengthening Statistical Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Statistics and Data Analysis Tools (Excel, R/Python Fundamentals)
context.additional_context: A program aimed at strengthening current practitioners' statistical application skills, providing hands-on experience in a limited coding environment using pre-processed data.

learning_goals: Learners explain conceptual principles of a given statistical model without treating it as a "black box"
Learners apply statistical techniques to solve practical problems through real-case-based data analysis projects

Learners can explain statistical reasoning results (e.g., mean, standard deviation, confidence intervals) related to public policy to non-experts (citizens, stakeholders) within 3 minutes, achieving over 80% satisfaction in post-explanation comprehension surveys
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
